alert.note: Alert for Lyman (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 03 at 12:39AM MDT until July 03 at 1:30AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Lyman County in central South Dakota... * Until 230 AM CDT. * At 138 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Earling Hill, or 7 miles southeast of Presho, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Kennebec and Byre Lake around 150 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Lyman, Reliance and Medicine Butte. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
